content.rendered:
Auditing

Registered Auditors in Dubai Healthcare City

Let us take care of all your audit requirements in the Dubai Healthcare City free zone.
Book A Free Consultation

Home

Dubai health care city is a popular free zone in UAE, dedicated to healthcare service in the Emirates. The free zone was launched in the year 2002 with a great infrastructure for setting up companies in the healthcare industry. Being one of the evolved business destinations, the DHCC authority requires the mandatory submission of audited financial statements at the time of license renewal for all entities. To achieve this purpose, DHCC has a list of registered auditors in Dubai Health care city to work on the auditing and accounting requirements of the free zone companies.

If you wish to excel in health care industry, then Dubai health care city is an ideal place to start with your business. Approved Auditors in Dubai Healthcare City will support your business establishment by maintaining a clear record of auditing books and makes it beneficial during the audit process.

Business entities operating in DHCC

DHCC is an open ground for entrepreneurs and professionals who deal with the healthcare business. Some of the business entities allowed in DHCC,

  • Branch of a UAE company
  • Branch of foreign company
  • Free zone – Limited liability company

Whatever may be the business entity; auditors in Dubai Healthcare City analyze your profit or loss over time and maintain the book of records. While conducting and implementing accounting procedures, it differs according to the healthcare sector.

Pharmaceutical companies

If you’re involved in the pharmaceutical manufacturing business, it’s essential to maintain the complete record of suppliers and customers. While approaching a registered auditor in Dubai healthcare city, they maintain your accounting information and avoid from any unnecessary issues.

Pharmaceutical retail business

Retail business involves a huge database of suppliers and customers. It’s essential to make sure that records are clear and maintained for safe auditing. Approved auditors in Dubai Health care city maintain the records with amount to be paid and the amount to be received from debtors.

Hospitals

Auditing in hospitals is a tedious task with several risk factors. The auditors in Dubai healthcare city maintain separate records of suppliers, staff, and patients. They turn out the complicated task into an easy job!

Advantages of business setup in DHCC

  • Complete ownership
  • No taxes
  • Exceptional infrastructure for healthcare businesses

Benefits of auditing by registered auditors in Dubai healthcare city

A & A associate is one of the approved auditors in Dubai health care city providing accounting and auditing services. Whether it’s a small enterprise or even large-sized business, we have the right team to acknowledge your auditing needs and comply with the accounting guidelines of UAE.

Some of the advantages of auditing in DHCC,

  • Track of financial stability of your business
  • Complete records of creditors and debtors
  • Effective financial planning
  • Clear view of business cash flow
  • Understand future of your business

Why choose A & A associates?

A & A associate is a pioneer in providing various types of audit works for Dubai healthcare city or any other free zones and mainland companies. Being one of the registered auditors in Dubai health care city, we ensure high-quality service to esteemed clients across the free zone.

Our accounting and auditing experts are well-versed in providing tailored solutions according to the business requirements of the clients. Combined with market experience and competitive advantage, we develop creative strategies to enhance your healthcare business and take it to the next level.

Consider A & A associates auditors in Dubai healthcare city to handle all your auditing requirements! Reach us today for expert advice on business audit!
